original: One way the Commitment to Health Theory can be utilized is in tracking and measuring patient indicators. This theory recognizes that health is not simply the absence of disease, but rather a dynamic state that encompasses physical, mental, and social well-being. By incorporating this theory into advanced nursing practice, nurses can take a holistic approach to patient assessment and evaluation. Th
